fights.name: The Second Coil of Bahamut - Turn 1 (Savage)
fights.description: Savage version of T6. The first official Savage raid tier in FFXIV, featuring significantly increased difficulty.

fights.description: Savage version of T9. Part of the Second Coil Savage tier with enhanced mechanics and damage.
